content:
# It seems I encountered an error while trying to insert coal into the furnace. The error indicates that I do not have any coal in my inventory to insert.

# Since coal is essential for smelting the iron ore, I need to gather some coal first. 

# I will locate the nearest coal resource and harvest it to ensure I can fuel the furnace.

resource_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Find the nearest coal resource.
move_to(resource_position)  # Move to the coal location.
